title: 97 - The Hiddenness Of God
description:
In the episode we take a look at moments on how and why God seems to hide. Mike takes some time to focus on some details related to his health over the past few month and how others have helped along the way to bring attention to God's mercy and guidance.

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
